meta.title: About Us ‚Äî HeliconTrade Mission & Team
meta.description: Learn about HeliconTrade's mission to democratize trading education and provide powerful tools for the next generation of traders.
meta.keywords: about HeliconTrade, mission, team, company, trading platform, fintech

hero.title: Democratizing Trading for Everyone
hero.subtitle: We're building the future of trading education and technology, making financial markets accessible to the next generation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Traditional trading platforms are complex, expensive, and designed for institutional investors. We're changing that by creating an intuitive, educational, and accessible platform for everyone.
mission.description2: Whether you're a complete beginner or an experienced trader, our platform grows with you, providing the tools and knowledge you need at every stage of your trading journey.

story.title: Our Story
story.description1: Founded in 2024, HeliconTrade emerged from a simple observation: traditional trading platforms were built for institutions, not individuals. Complex interfaces, hidden fees, and poor educational resources created barriers for everyday people wanting to participate in financial markets.
story.description2: We set out to change this by building a platform that puts education first, maintains transparency in pricing, and provides institutional-grade tools in an intuitive interface. Today, we're proud to serve thousands of traders worldwide.
story.description3: Our team combines decades of experience in finance, technology, and education to create a platform that truly serves our users' needs. We're not just building software ‚Äì we're building the future of financial education.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

missionDriven.title: Mission Driven
missionDriven.description: We believe everyone deserves access to quality financial education and trading tools.

securityFirst.title: Security First
securityFirst.description: Your funds and data are protected with bank-grade security and encryption.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously evolve our platform with cutting-edge technology and user feedback.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a supportive community where traders learn, grow, and succeed together.

cta.title: Join Our Mission
cta.subtitle: Be part of the trading revolution. Start your journey with us today.

tokenPricing.title: How Tokens Work
tokenPricing.description: Each feature uses a specific number of tokens. Buy additional tokens when needed, or upgrade to a higher plan.

additionalTokens.title: Need More Tokens?

calculator.title: Token Bundle Calculator

whatAreTokens.question: What are tokens and how do they work?
whatAreTokens.answer: Tokens are credits you use to access premium features. Research reports cost 2 tokens each, alerts cost 1 token each, and backtesting runs cost 5 tokens each. You can use your monthly token allowance across any combination of features ‚Äì there are no category restrictions.

tokenExpiry.question: Do tokens expire?
tokenExpiry.answer: No, unused tokens never expire. Your monthly plan replenishes your token balance, and any additional token bundles you purchase remain in your account until used.

changePlans.question: Can I change plans anytime?
changePlans.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges. Your tokens remain in your account when switching plans.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free plan?
freeTrial.answer: Yes! The Starter plan is completely free forever with 100 tokens monthly. You get full access to all features including research reports, alerts, and backtesting - just with a monthly token limit. No credit card required.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. Enterprise customers can arrange custom payment terms and invoicing.

additionalTokens.question: How do I buy additional tokens?
additionalTokens.answer: Trader and Professional plan members can purchase 1,000-token bundles for $10 each directly from their dashboard. Tokens never expire and can be used across any premium features. Starter plan users need to upgrade to purchase additional tokens.
